subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic opened his bid for a third BNP Paribas Open championship in Indian Wells, Calif., by topping the qualifier Andrey Golubev, 6-3, 6-2, on Saturday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic opened his bid for a third BNP Paribas Open championship in Indian Wells, Calif., by topping the qualifier Andrey Golubev, 6-3, 6-2, on Saturday.
